Directions.1: Fill a large pot with water and place a sous vide immersion cooker into the water. Set temperature to 170 degrees F (77 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions. Once water is up to temp, slowly lower eggs into the water using a slotted spoon. Set timer for 40 minutes

Directions.2: Remove eggs from water once timer is up and place in a large bowl. Slowly shake bowl around to gently crack the eggs. Cover with ice water to cool. Peel carefully under running water.
